Name: neurosarcoidosis
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by involvement of the nervous symptom with cranial nerve palsy

Name: uveoparotid fever
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by unilateral facial nerve palsy

Name: cardiac sarcoidosis
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by conduction abnormalities

Name: hypercalcemic sarcoidosis
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by noncaseating granulomatous infiltration of the lungs and supporting lymph nodes

Name: obsolete metastasis to pleura
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by noncaseating granulomatous infiltration of the lungs and supporting lymph nodes
